analysis: The project appears to be a web application with a focus on Egyptian-themed UI elements. The current event requests a light color desert theme with mobile responsiveness and clean design. The existing to-dos indicate that there are issues with mobile menu functionality, CSS updates for Egyptian-themed colors, and SVG data URLs. The main areas that need attention are the HTML structure, CSS styling, and JavaScript functionality to ensure a cohesive and functional UI.

improvements.description: Update the CSS file with an Egyptian-themed color palette, including light desert colors such as sandy beige, warm gold, and soft turquoise. Ensure the design is clean and modern.
Ensure the HTML structure supports a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon. Add necessary HTML elements for the mobile menu toggle.
Fix the mobile menu toggle functionality by removing the syntax error and implementing proper event handling, smooth transitions, and user-friendly interactions.
Fix the SVG data URL to include proper SVG content for Egyptian-themed patterns, ensuring the patterns are displayed correctly in the UI.
Ensure all buttons are functional and styled according to the Egyptian-themed design. Add hover effects and transitions for better user interaction.
